habanero 0.6.0 documentation¶

Python client for the Crossref API

Source on GitHub at sckott/habanero

Getting help¶

Having trouble? Or want to know how to get started?

  • Try the FAQ – it’s got answers to some common questions.
  • Looking for specific information? Try the Index
  • Report bugs with habanero in our issue tracker.

Modules¶

habanero modules
Introduction to habanero modules.
crossref module
The crossref module: core Crossref APIs.
Crossref Search Filters
The filters module: Filters details for use with Crossref module.
counts module
The counts module: Crossref citation counts.
cn module
The cn module: Crossref content negotation.
